articles.description: At revised volume projections, GAIL India can realise even higher, approximately Rs 66 per mmbtu as compared with Rs 64 per mmbtu earlier, according to Kotak Institutional Equities.
articles.content:
With the Petroleum and Natural Gas Regulatory Board (PNGRB) raising unified tariff for the national gas grid, Kotak Institutional Equities sees higher realisation for GAIL India.

articles.title: TVS Motor Co June sales climb 3% at 3,16,411 units - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The company had sold 3,08,501 units in June 2022, TVS Motor Company said in a statement.
articles.content:
